widget.name: Listview filter
widget.description: Search Mendix List views, Template Grids and Data Grids using a single-field search

property.caption: List view name
property.description: Optional, if not specified the closest list view is used

property.caption: Filter method
property.description: Contains as default and first option

property.caption: List view entity
property.description: Full name of the entity "module.entity". This entity should match the list view entity

property.caption: Search attributes
property.description: The search attributes on the search entity

property.caption: Attribute name
property.description: Attribute on the list view datasource entity or list view search entity

property.caption: Default query
property.description: The default query that is used to filter the list

property.caption: Show search bar
property.description: It controls if the search bar should be visible or not

property.caption: Placeholder
property.description: Specifies a short hint that describes the expected value of the search input field
